details.description: Music genre classifier, music generator and style transfer, diffusion map algorithm on large biomedical datasets, US wildfire clustering, CT housing price prediction based on Zillow reviews, deep reinforcement learning on Flappy Bird game
Packages: Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch, SciPy, Keras, Matplotlib, Seaborn
Constructed a CFD model of a ship's propeller jet with C++, investigating the pressure and velocity field on canal bottoms
Pioneered a number of advanced optimization techniques, leading to a more economical canal design (grade: 18/20)
